name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog: This release focuses on stability and polish. It fixes critical sync issues where reactions would disappear or fail to sync between the video player and detail pages. It also introduces new data management features (Import/Export/Wipe) and a redesigned, more compact reaction list with user avatars.
